::DrillBit::

DrillBit looked streight at KitKat.
"Ok, if you dont want to try it, thats fine." He thought to himself.
His plan, was foiled, but he didn't care. He new that she had the smarts
to pull it off, but they would have had major losses. He had been
pushing the mission for himself, but now he was in love. It was more
important to protect KitKat, then to take over the Preds.
